<b>How is this Table Populated?</b>


<p>The table above uses our unbiased Leaders Matrix data within the software development service line. The Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the best-performing software development companies, each company featured is evaluated on specific criteria. This criteria includes Area of Focus and Ability to Deliver. Area of Focus accounts for a companys specialization within a certain service. Ability to Deliver includes client reviews, past projects, market presence and reputation in the industry. These are not paid placements.</p>

<p>Note: This table was last updated on January 28, 2025.</p>

<b><p>Clutch Offers Objective, Independent Research &amp; Verified Client Experiences</p></b>

<p>Clutch empowers better business decisions as the leading marketplace of B2B service providers. Our in-depth and verified client experiences detail each project from start to finish, helping businesses looking to procure services, narrow down their list of potential business partners quickly and confidently.</p>

<p>With access to information such as how much a service provider charges for their services, how they communicate, and the results of the project, you can feel confident that youve found the right software development company for your project.</p>

<p>The verification process seeks to establish proof of connection between the reviewer and their own organization, as well as the collaboration theyre reviewing. By verifying the identity of the reviewer and confirming their connection to the project, Clutch is able to confirm that there is no conflict of interest and that the project took place. Buyers can easily identify verified reviews by the check mark in the bottom right corner of the review card. You can learn more about the <a href="https://help.clutch.co/en/knowledge/how-clutch-verifies-reviews"> review verification process here</a>.</p>

<b><p>Bespoke Software Development Expertise</p></b>

<p>Software development companies on Clutch are highly skilled and vetted. They are certified bespoke software developers with familiarity in multiple programming languages, frameworks, and application platforms. Whether youre looking for a no-code, low-code, or fully custom platform, Clutch software development companies deliver high-quality results.</p>

<p>In addition to review rating, you can view awards, portfolio of past work and clients and industry recognitions. Clutch verification also provides an additional layer of data to help you make the right purchasing decision which goes into business details and payment and legal filings. If you found a business on clutch, you can feel confident in your B2B purchasing decision.</p>

<b><p>How Much does a Software Development Company Cost?</p></b>

Most custom software development projects on Clutch cost between $10,000$49,999, but the total price depends on a variety of factors, including how complex the software is. In terms of hourly rate, you can expect to pay between $25-$49 per hour, but as the scope of your project expands, the more resources, time, and experience is required to bring your vision to life. As a result, the overall cost of your project will increase as well.<br>
<br>
<b><p>6 Questions to Ask Software Development Companies Before Hiring</p></b>

<p>Ask these questions when interviewing software agencies:</p>

<b><p>What is your experience with projects similar to ours?</p></b>

<p>By asking about their previous work, you can gauge whether they can deliver a product that meets your needs.To get a better understanding of what it could be like to work with a software development firm youre talking with, ask them what their development process is like and the results were of similar projects </p>

<p>Better yet, ask them about hurdles theyve experienced over the course of the project and how they overcame them.</p>

<b><p>Can you provide references or case studies from previous clients?</p></b>

<p>References provide valuable insights into the companys past performance, reliability, and quality of work. Speaking directly with previous clients can help you understand how the company handles project challenges, communicates with clients, and meets deadlines. This first-hand feedback is often more candid and detailed than any marketing materials or case studies.</p>

<p>Moreover, references can shed light on the company's ability to deliver on its promises and maintain long-term relationships. By asking specific questions about the scope, budget adherence, and overall satisfaction, you can gain a clearer picture of what to expect. </p>

<b><p>What is your development process and how do you handle project management?</p></b>

<p>Project management is a key aspect of a successful software development partnership. Great software development companies have workflows and methodologies in place to make sure that the development process keeps moving forward. </p>

<p>Effective project management helps to set clear objectives, delineate responsibilities, and establish timelines, which are essential for keeping a project on track. By utilizing structured methodologies and tools, project managers can streamline processes, identify potential risks early, and allocate resources more effectively. </p>

<b><p>How do you ensure the quality of the software you develop?</p></b>

<p>Software development companies need to ensure that the product not only meets the project requirements but is also reliable, efficient, and user-friendly. To do this, they should allocate part of the project budget to testing and quality assurance. Understanding how they intend to do this ensures that the developer has a structured approach to managing and mitigating risks. </p>

<p>It also highlights their ability to provide consistent documentation, timely updates, and comprehensive support. A developers answer to this question can reveal their level of experience, attention to detail, and problem-solving skills, which are critical for delivering a successful product.</p>

<b><p>What is your approach to post-launch support and maintenance?</p></b>

<p>Post-launch support and regular maintenance are vital for the sustainability and continued success of any software solution. By asking companies about their support and maintenance strategies, you can ensure that you partner with a firm that prioritizes not just the development, but the longevity and reliability. </p>

<b><p>How do you manage communication and collaboration during the project?</p></b>

<p>Effective communication fosters transparency and trust between the client and the outsourcing provider, making it a cornerstone of a productive partnership. When outsourcing to a bespoke software development company, you should have established communication channels and regular touch points. This ensures smooth communication between your team and theirs, and also provides opportunities for collaboration and feedback, ensuring that the project runs smoothly. </p>

<b><p>Browse popular software programming languages:</p></b>  <a href="https://clutch.co/developers/sql">SQL developers</a>, <a href="https://clutch.co/developers/cplusplus">C++ developers</a> and <a href="https://clutch.co/developers/flutter">Flutter developers</a>. Also, be sure to examine software developers in different locations, such as <a href="https://clutch.co/developers/uk">UK software developers</a>, <a href="https://clutch.co/us/developers">US software developers</a>, <a href="https://clutch.co/ca/developers">Canada software developers</a>.

Filter by experience, project size, reviews, and budget to find the ideal software development firm for your business needs.

        Reviews mention Open to feedback
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Designli has received positive feedback regarding their openness to client feedback. Clients highlighted their excellent listening skills and responsiveness to suggestions, with one client noting, &#39;They excel at listening to our feedback and providing quality responses.&#39; Another client stated, &#39;They&#39;re very flexible to my needs,&#39; indicating a willingness to adapt and refine project elements based on client input. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Designli&#39;s collaborative approach and commitment to client satisfaction.
      </p>

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Custom Software Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        UI/UX Design Services for Immigration Consulting Firm
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
          Designli is helping an immigration consulting firm create the UI/UX of their app. Their tasks include creating the design framework and developing a proof of concept.

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="31689"
              data-gtm_insight_id="719023"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Open to feedback
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Open to feedback
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Brainhub for their openness to feedback and collaboration. One client highlighted the team&#39;s ability to work closely with their developers, emphasizing that Brainhub&#39;s developer was proactive, responsible, and integrated seamlessly into their team. They appreciated the regular feedback sessions and dynamic communication facilitated through tools like Slack and Trello. Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction with Brainhub&#39;s commitment to adapting to client needs and contributing to project success.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="31689"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="67836"
          data-gtm_insight_id="719023"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Staff Augmentation for IT Services Business</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 21, 2020</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We had regular daily meetings in the mornings to discuss current tasks and priorities, and <b>feedback sessions to submit amendments</b>. The team was able to run several releases daily, making the process dynamic. We appreciate their knowledge, engagement, and dedication. They deliver high quality, <b>are open to feedback and collaboration</b>. They supplemented the team effectively and were able to cooperate with our developers flawlessly, oriented on our platforms success, as they were working with us since forever.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Open to feedback
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed a positive sentiment regarding ROCKETECH&#39;s openness to feedback. One client noted that the developers provided rapid feedback and were receptive to changes during the project, which facilitated a productive adjustment stage. Additionally, the client highlighted the company&#39;s willingness to collaborate closely on various tasks, indicating a strong commitment to meeting client needs.
      </p>

            </div>

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The sentiment regarding AgileEngine&#39;s accommodating nature is overwhelmingly positive. Clients frequently highlight their flexibility and responsiveness to project needs. For example, one client noted AgileEngine&#39;s ability to adapt various project management styles, seamlessly integrating into existing workflows. Another client praised their creative problem-solving and proactive engagement, stating that AgileEngine&#39;s team is invested in their success and willing to pivot as necessary. Overall, clients appreciate AgileEngine&#39;s commitment to aligning with their goals and processes.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Open to feedback
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The overall sentiment regarding Goji Labs&#39; openness to feedback is highly positive. Clients commend their responsiveness and ability to incorporate suggestions throughout the project. One client noted, &#34;Goji Labs was responsive to what we asked for&#34; and appreciated their receptiveness to feedback on design specifications. Another client highlighted that Goji Labs incorporated feedback effectively, stating, &#34;They learned and incorporated feedback as the project progressed.&#34; This demonstrates a strong commitment to collaboration and client satisfaction.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Passionate about their work
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently express a strong sentiment regarding iTechArt Group&#39;s passion for their work. One client noted that their developers are &#39;more experienced and passionate&#39; than those from other companies, highlighting their willingness to work beyond contracted hours to ensure project success. Another client emphasized iTechArt&#39;s ability to attract high-quality engineers who are genuinely interested in startup projects, reinforcing the notion that the team is not merely task-oriented but actively engaged in building innovative solutions.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"

          data-gtm_insight_id="793313"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web & Software Development for Online Real Estate Portal </h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Dec 13, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Compared to other companies Ive worked with, iTechArt Groups developers are more experienced and <b>passionate about their work</b>. There are a lot of teammates who <b>make the extra effort and work past contracted hours to deliver for us</b>. It makes our entire partnership work smoothly  iTechArt Group isnt just there to complete a task, theyre <b>building a product with us</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

Across numerous reviews, clients consistently highlight S-PRO's tailored solutions, adaptability, and effective project management, indicating a high level of satisfaction with their services. Approximately 90% of reviews praise their technical expertise and commitment to client needs, emphasizing the company's ability to deliver complex projects on time and within budget.

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Open to feedback
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        S-PRO has received positive feedback regarding their openness to client input throughout various projects. Clients noted that S-PRO actively seeks feedback to enhance collaboration, with one client appreciating their responsiveness to critical issues. Additionally, the CTO&#39;s engagement in refining project ideas was highlighted as a significant strength. Overall, clients expressed satisfaction with the communication and adaptability of S-PRO, leading to smooth project execution and improved outcomes.
      </p>

                Creative
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Creative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed high satisfaction with ISCG&#39;s creative approach to problem-solving and continuous improvement. One client noted, &#39;It&#39;s amazing... they recommend new improvements every year,&#39; highlighting ISCG&#39;s proactive brainstorming. The overall sentiment reflects that ISCG excels in delivering innovative solutions, making them a preferred partner for complex challenges in the Polish market.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">

      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">

          CGS-team provides custom software development services for a management software company. The team is responsible for the client's website and web application's front- and backend development.

                    class="provider__description-text-more  project-highlight-text"
                    data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"

The reviews highlight their exceptional project management and client-centered approach, with 100% positive feedback praising their commitment to surpassing client expectations and high standards in software engineering.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Communicative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Zallpy Digital has received positive feedback regarding their communicative approach. Clients have noted their responsiveness, with one stating, &#39;They are very responsive; we communicate via WhatsApp any time we need them.&#39; Additionally, the team is described as &#39;very helpful and communicative,&#39; which has contributed to a satisfying collaboration. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for their communication skills, enhancing the effectiveness of the engagement.
      </p>

        Reviews mention Easy to work with
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The feedback regarding GCD highlights their approachability and ease of collaboration. Clients noted that GCD&#39;s team was consistently available and responsive, facilitating seamless communication throughout projects. One client emphasized their customer-centric approach, stating that GCD quickly understood complex requirements and proposed beneficial solutions. Another client appreciated the team&#39;s ability to simplify technical discussions, ensuring clarity for all stakeholders. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong satisfaction with GCD&#39;s collaborative nature and expertise.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Flexible
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised EXLRT for their flexibility and responsiveness throughout the project lifecycle. One client noted their &#39;very responsive and flexible&#39; approach to multiple changes in requests, highlighting their quick responses to bug fixes and ongoing availability for discussions. Another emphasized their adaptability to changes in the work environment, showcasing a strong commitment to meeting client needs and ensuring project success.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Custom Software Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Custom App Development for Banking Institution
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
          EXLRT has developed a custom application for a banking institution. The team maintains the app, which has multiple process models for loan approval and contracting and banking API integrations.
        
        <a
          target="_blank"
          href="/go-to-review/exlrt/311920"
          title="Read Full Review on EXLRT"
          aria-label="Read Full Review on EXLRT"
          class="provider-insight__highlight-more-link"
          data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1773052"
          data-gtm_review_id="311920"
          data-gtm_insight_id="2133167"
        >
          Read more
        </a>
      </p>
    </div>

    <a
      target="_blank"
      href="/profile/exlrt?service_provided=Custom%20Software%20Development#reviews"
      title="View EXLRT Reviews"

Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong approval of their professional approach and the successful execution of projects.

<div
    class="provider provider-row sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed provider-row--non-ppc "
    data-is-list="true"
    data-clutch-pid="1922094"
    data-title="Walter Code LTD"

    
        data-position="1465"
        data-type="Directory"

>

    
    
    

    
    




<button

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention High-quality work
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently commend Passion4Tech for their high-quality work, emphasizing their proactive communication and attention to detail. One client noted their &#39;innate perfectionism&#39; that ensured a great final product, while another highlighted the team&#39;s ability to deliver a well-structured prototype and adapt based on feedback. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for the team&#39;s dedication to client success and effective project management.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1794582"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="148889"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1525288"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Sales Process Optimization for Product Design Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 6, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The straightforward way they communicate when they see a point or process that can be optimized and the innate perfectionism that pushed them to <b>work with us until we had a great final product</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"

      <p class="provider-insight__description">

          Pynest provides various development and IT services for an insurance and healthcare company. The scope includes implementing new features, writing tests, and code refactoring and review.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Professional
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback highlights Platform Services&#39; professionalism, particularly noting their efficient project management and responsiveness. A client praised the Project Manager&#39;s remarkable communication and handling of information throughout the project. Additionally, the speed of website creation and adherence to agreed-upon deliverables were emphasized as impressive attributes. Overall, sentiment regarding professionalism is highly positive, with no areas for improvement identified by clients.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1433510"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="109696"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1040532"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web Design for Medical Clinic</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 11, 2020</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Project Manager from W3Industry was on the call with us for everything required for this project and did remarkable job handling all information and updating us as the project was developing. Most impressive was their speed in creating the website, and all in all <b>their professionalism when it comes to providing what was agreed</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

    class="provider provider-row sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed provider-row--non-ppc "

        Reviews mention Professional
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have praised InfiniteProgress for their professionalism and flexibility throughout the project. One client noted, &#39;They understood what I wanted, and they were very flexible,&#39; highlighting effective communication and a positive team dynamic. Another remarked on the team&#39;s openness, stating, &#39;The cooperation was, and still is, very good.&#39; Overall, the sentiment reflects satisfaction with InfiniteProgress&#39;s professional approach, with no significant areas for improvement identified at this time.
      </p>
    </div>

            >Codenot is a bespoke software development company known for its efficient processes and strong alignment with client values.         Reviews mention Open to feedback

      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The feedback regarding White Label&#39;s openness to feedback is overwhelmingly positive. Clients appreciate the UX designer&#39;s capability and willingness to consider ideas, with one noting their &#39;open-minded attitude&#39; as crucial during challenges. The project manager was also praised for effective communication. <section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Professional
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        BrightMarbles is consistently praised for their professionalism, with clients noting their proactive communication, timely delivery, and high technical expertise. For instance, one client highlighted their team&#39;s dedication to addressing urgent needs even outside regular hours, while another emphasized their ability to understand complex requirements and deliver effective solutions. Overall, the sentiment regarding BrightMarbles&#39; professionalism is overwhelmingly positive, with clients expressing satisfaction and a desire to continue collaboration.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="811198"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="291728"
          data-gtm_insight_id="960345"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">DevOps Services for Software Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 30, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Always delivered on time, they consistently went above and beyond by being available even outside of regular working hours to address any urgent interventions that arose. Their <b>dedication to prompt and reliable service</b> ensures that critical issues are swiftly resolved, contributing to the smooth operation of the project and instilling confidence in their ability to handle any challenges effectively. Their past efficiency and professionalism have been crucial for our project, and we hope they will continue to provide the same level of quality and reliability in the future.
            </p>
          </div>

        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Solutions for Software Company</h5>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Passionate about their work
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently highlight Bad Dinosaur&#39;s passion for their work, noting the team&#39;s energy and dedication. One client remarked on their &#39;make this happen attitude&#39; and ability to translate technical concepts into accessible language. Another emphasized the team&#39;s enthusiasm and innovative ideas, which significantly improved their product. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Bad Dinosaur&#39;s commitment to delivering exceptional results, with clients feeling supported and engaged throughout the development process.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="629895"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="105747"
          data-gtm_insight_id="930756"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web App for Arts & Crafts Business</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Nov 4, 2020</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Bad Dinosaur provided passionate and talented designers, developers, and project manager. They combined this with a <b>"make this happen attitude"</b>, ability to translate tech speak into meaningful language (for a non-techie) clearly defining how this impacted on objectives for the product, agreed deliverables, UX and future development and obviously cost. This was all combined with a sense of humour, flexibility wherever possible, and genuine care for creating a really great product. Without doubt they <b>went the extra mile on every journey</b>. I would say they are rare indeed.
            </p>
          </div>

            <button

              data-gtm_provider_id="24969"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Open to feedback
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Tangent Digital Agency has demonstrated a strong openness to feedback, as evidenced by a client&#39;s remark about their willingness to receive both positive and critical input for improvement. The client appreciated the agency&#39;s focus on return on investment and noted effective communication, including weekly status meetings that facilitated productive discussions. However, the client suggested that more industry insight could enhance performance evaluation, indicating an area for potential growth.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Understands the needs of their clients
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Innocode has demonstrated a strong understanding of client needs, as evidenced by their proactive engagement and integration into the client&#39;s team. One client noted that Innocode&#39;s developers not only took ownership of their tasks but also provided suggestions for improving product development efficiency. The feedback highlights their ability to immerse themselves in the client&#39;s challenges, effectively contributing to tailored solutions. Overall, the sentiment reflects a high level of satisfaction with Innocode&#39;s commitment to understanding and addressing client requirements.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1795364"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="143160"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1080401"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Dev for Property Management SaaS Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 27, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Overall, the Innocode team isnt only extremely knowledgeable and good at what theyre doing; theyre also extremely good at taking ownership of their tasks. They immerse themselves into our product and clients needs; <b>they truly understand the problems that we try to solve for our clients</b>. Interact with the team and include them in the bigger picture of the project. Even if youre working with Innocode on a technology-based project, dont limit your communication with them to technology. Instead, include their developers in your business as a whole. That way, youll see that <b>their team understands your needs and cares for you as their customer</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

</li>



        
        
        
        
            
        
    
</ul>

<div class="directory-cta directory-cta__bottom">
  <h2 class="directory-cta__bottom-title">Get closer to kicking off your next project today</h2>

        <div class="lm-only-related-block">
    <div id="lm-methodology-accordion" class="lm-only-related-block lm-methodology sg-accordion sg-accordion-large sg-accordion-bordered sg-accordion-contrast">
        <button
            type="button"
            aria-label="Portfolio & Awards"
            class="sg-accordion__title-wrapper sg-secondary-title sg-secondary-title--icon-plus"
            data-dom__data-accordion-status="open"
        >
            <span class="container sg-accordion__title sg-secondary-title__text">
                How the Leaders Matrix Works
            </span>
        </button>

        <div class="container sg-accordion__contents">
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-1">
                <p class="lm-methodology__text">
                    A Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the top-performing companies in a particular service or
                    location. Each company featured in a Leaders Matrix is evaluated based on Focus and Ability to Deliver.
                    The size of each circle indicates that companys size.

                    <a
                        target="_blank"
                        href="https://clutch.co/methodology"
                        title="Learn More about Leaders Matrix Methodology"
                        class="lm-methodology__link"
                        aria-label="Click LM Methodology Learn More"
                        data-gtm_event_category="click_lm_methodology_learn_more"
                    >
                        Learn More
                    </a>
                </p>
            </div>
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-2">
                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Focus</b> (x-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Focus accounts for a companys specialization within a certain service.</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Ability to Deliver</b> (y-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Ability to Deliver considers three criteria:</p>

                <ol class="lm-methodology__list">
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Client feedback and reviews</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Work experience and previous projects</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Market presence and reputation in the industry</li>
                </ol>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    </div>
    <div id="lm-providers__section" class="lm-only-related-block lm-providers sg-container">

            <section class="directory-only-related-block programmatic-content mmg"><div class="mmg-content-section">
<div class="container"><article class="sc-excerpt">
	<header class="sc-excerpt__header">
		<h2>Comparing Custom Software Development Agencies: Your Comprehensive Guide</h2>
	</header>
	<div class="sc-excerpt__intro">
		<p>In today's fast-paced business landscape, finding the right service provider is crucial for success. Whether you're a CEO, a Founder,  or a CTO, choosing the best partner for your specific needs can make all the difference. That's where Clutch comes in, serving as your go-to resource for comparing and selecting Software Engineering companies. With over 67,641 reviews and ratings from real customers, Clutch provides valuable insights to help you make informed decisions. Learn more about the world of Software Development service providers, exploring key data points, including the most popular, best-rated, and budget-friendly companies.</p>
<p>Before we dive into the specifics, let's get an overview of the Custom Software Development landscape on Clutch. Currently, there are approximately 10,292 companies with ratings and reviews in this category. These companies serve a wide range of clients, including Microsoft, Deloitte, NDA, and many more. In terms of clientele, 11,604 companies cater to Small Businesses, 7,610 to the MidMarket and 2,474 to the Enterprise. These companies span various industries, including Information technology, eCommerce, Business services, Medical,  and Financial services, among others.</p>
<p> Check the drop downs below for summaries of Custom Software Development companies by:</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="#anchor-most-popular" itemprop="url">Most Popular</a></li>
<li><a href="#anchor-industries-served" itemprop="url">Industries Served</a></li>
<li><a href="#anchor-agencies-by-specialty" itemprop="url">Agencies by Specialty</a></li>
</ul>
<p>Clutch is your comprehensive resource for comparing and selecting the best Custom Software Development companies based on reviews, ratings, and data points. With a diverse range of providers, budgets, and service focus areas, you can make an informed decision to propel your business forward. Whether you're a large enterprise, a midsize firm, or a small business, Clutch has the information you need to find the perfect partner for your Software Engineering needs.</p>

	</div>

</article>
</div>

These companies have garnered over 16,342 customer reviews on average and typically work with a minimum spend limit ranging from $1,000 to $250,000. They specialize in serving industries such as Dental, eCommerce,  and Advertising &amp; marketing, with a focus on services like Google app engine, Laravel, SQL, ASP.NET,  and C#.                     <strong><em>- (5 stars) Varvara T., Product Manager, Healthmatters.io - May 17, 2024</em></strong>
                </div>
                <div class="col-lg-4 mt-4">
                    Empat has offered excellent project management, consistently meeting deadlines and successfully launching the new product on time. The team is highly communicative and collaborative, and their emphatic attitude sets them apart. They communicate via virtual meetings.
                    <strong><em>- (5 stars) <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/paveltafi/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Pavlo T., CEO, Clueby</a> - Apr 3, 2024</em></strong>
